parameters: \lsoffWelcome to the Easy Mode Cheat Room!

\!
This is where you can mess with the game in unintended ways and unlock things for free if you wish.
\lsoffHowever, a word of advice: \C[27]Odyssey of Gianna is a game where the gameplay and the hentai are usually intertwined, moreso than other H-games.
\lsoffIt is the strong opinion of the developer that the game is best experienced by playing through it normally.
\lsoffThat said, if you still wish to use this room, please enjoy and consider giving the game a try on Normal or Hard!
\lsoff\>This is the Knight Statue of Lesser Leveling.
\lsoff\>This is the Knight Statue of Greater Leveling.
\lsoff\>This is the Golden Statue of Endless Wealth.
\>Choose an amount of Gold to gain.
\lsoff\>This is the Angel Statue of Lesser Leveling.
\>Level up everyone in the party by 1?
\lsoff\>This is the Angel Statue of Greater Leveling.
\>Level up everyone in the party by 10?
\lsoff\>This is the Dragon Statue of Weapons.
\lsoff\>This is the Dragon Statue of Armor.
\lsoff\>This is the Dragon Statue of Items.
\lsoff\>This is the Fast Travel Rune of Unlocking.

\lsoffGianna Castle, Gianna Plaza, Bordertown, Forest Cabin, Woodrot Forest, New Rokkas, Sea Market, Cathedral of the Spirit, West Beach Outpost, Alisha's House, Forsaken Tower, Chateau d'Yterre, Vemix's Laboratory, Mt. Pleasant, City of Mist, Valua, Northern Underground, Urverk.

\lsoff\>Any Fast Travel points not included in this list have some form of requirement in order to enter (such as buying tickets to the Circus), and as such it's part of the game's design to meet those requirements.
\lsoff\>This is the Fast Travel Rune of Unlocking.
\lsoff\>This is the Witch of Copious Elixirs.
\lsoff\>These are the Scrolls of Enemy Lore.
\lsoff\>This is the Book of Bad Ends.
\lsoff\>\C[6]Please note that many of these scenes will make much
\>less sense without playing the game for context!
\lsoff\>(The Bad End Journal is already complete.)
\>Max out Attraction for all party members?
\>Every time you open it, it'll give you a random non-key item.
\>Make a party member into a Thrall?
